scripts.upgrade: npm run update && npm run postinstall && npm run build
scripts.update: npm run update:spa && npm run update:modules
scripts.update:modules: ls -1 modules | xargs -r -I {} bash -c 'cd modules/{} && ncu -u'
scripts.postinstall: npm run install:spa && npm run install:modules && npm run install:server
scripts.install:modules: ls -1 modules | xargs -r -I {} bash -c 'cd modules/{} && npm i'
scripts.build: npm run build:spa && npm run build:modules
scripts.build:modules: ls -1 modules | xargs -r -I {} bash -c 'cd modules/{} && npm run build'
scripts.test: npm run test:spa && npm run test:modules
scripts.test:modules: ls -1 modules | xargs -r -I {} bash -c 'cd modules/{} && npm test'
scripts.start: cd server && (npm start & (sleep 1 && open http://localhost:9000) & wait) || :;
